duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through business to business sales.
Identify and prioritize sales opportunities, manage multiple touch points, and provide follow-up to drive outcomes.
Engage in face-to-face networking, client acquisition, and business discussions to promote and sell products and services.
Maintain client relationships and focus on future revenue growth.
Utilize compelling communication to bring concepts to life and persistently drive sales.
Receive training in publishing and receive ongoing support for professional development.
Work in a high-performance environment with limited territories.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
